Class RaytracerDisplayCanvas1 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----java.awt.Component
           |
           +----java.awt.Canvas
                   |
                   +----DisplayCanvas
                           |
                           +----RaytracerDisplayCanvas1
public class RaytracerDisplayCanvas1
extends DisplayCanvas
implements MouseListener
RaytracerDisplayCanvas1.java adds mouse clicking to the left canvas. used to specify the point to animate a rendering.

Version:
99.3.1
Author:
Brian Maltzan

mouse_click

RaytracerDisplayCanvas1(Sim, String, int)

get_mouse_click()
return last (x,y) point on canvas clicked.
